column4: hi... i'm new here.. i dont speak to good english... but i need some help with.. i have a amd dual core and installed ubuntu 32 bit...in system monitor shows only one cpu
my questions is... it is working only one cpu? if not... what can i do to shows me the twos cpus?
a dual core is actually 1 cpu, as I understand it, it won't show up as 2. I thinkl
especially since your running 32-bit, you probably won't be able too utilize all that power and features
